title: Security Incident
content: NOTICE: On the 05-DEC-2025 around 23:00, the website was attacked by an outside actor attempting to upload a crypto miner using vulnerability CVE-2025-55182 on the container, thankfully my safeguards prevented this attack by shutting down the container. As a result, apart from mild annoyance and downtime, no other malicious actions occured. No data was stolen, no passwords were stolen and the website is now back up online. I apologize to everyone. If anyone is running a localized version of the MDC Panel, please update it to >=3.6.0.01
